text: If you, or your company, use images in your e-mail signatures, what kind of file sizes are you seeing?
are you seeing this in emails?
I've seen some 128x128 pixel person portraits weighing 3 megabytes, yes
I'm just interested as to how widespread this kind of rampant disregard for everything is
I'm sure the improved CTR is well worth it :clown_face:
i would say it is pretty normal to not care about image file size in emails
only if the sending limit is exceeded

Yeah it's like, here's my e-mail message

And here's a couple of War & Peaces worth of some irrelevant stuff
Hi there, solicitation/self promotion goes against our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|Developer Slack Community Code of Conduct>. This message was deleted for that reason.
